column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This restaurant is the ideal place to go for a dinner date. The atmosphere is very much intimate
column2: the lighting in the restaurant is dimmed and just about every single table has lit candles. The music is great as well. Upstairs they play a lot of classic jazz and down they play a lot of great instrumental music like tracks by flying lotus and many others. (We were seated down stairs)
